title: Rendezvous
description: Complete ERP software implementation for a Qatar-based game parlor, covering employee, inventory, and booking management with financial reporting.
features: Encompassing employee & inventory management systems
Seamless and end-to-end games and cafeteria bookings
Advance Checkout page along with clean and modern UI

title: Fitme AI
description: AI-powered fitness platform with personalized coaching to help users achieve health goals faster and more efficiently.
features: User authentication and profile creation via Google
Automated BMI and BMR calculations with detailed health metrics and educational content
Location-based gym finder with integrated mapping services
AI coach with conversational chat interface, chat history and session management

title: Workdone
description: Dual-platform marketplace app for Australian client connecting service providers with customers. Published on App Store and Play Store.
features: User authentication and authorization
Payment integration for seamless transactions
Review and rating system
Real-time chat system for customer-provider communication
Animated UI components for enhanced user experience
Complete backend REST APIs and services

title: GoKidney
description: Mobile application for AIIMS Delhi helping hemodialysis patients track health metrics including vitals, exercise data, calories, and steps.
features: Health metrics tracking (vitals, exercise, calories, steps)
Samsung wearable integration for automatic data sync
Patient dashboard with comprehensive health insights
Designed for hemodialysis patients with medical team collaboration

title: IUCN Asia Desktop App
description: Offline-first desktop application for IUCN Asia (Bangkok) with advanced search functionality across comprehensive databases.
features: Offline-first architecture for reliable access
Advanced search functionality across databases
Native OS integration for Windows and macOS
Comprehensive database management
